title: Did NFL Champion Tom Brady Attribute His Success to Gisele Bündchen’s ‘Witchcraft’?
subtitle: A conservative Christian radio host made hay with throwaway remarks made by the six-time Super Bowl champion in February 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Tom Brady attributed his success as an NFL quarterback to the "witchcraft" of his wife, Gisele Bündchen.
